title: Fact Check: Old picture from a protest in Chile shared with FAKE claim | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture of a minor girl is doing rounds on social media in which she can be seen staring at a man in uniform. The picture is being shared in context of posts with regards to detention of five Palestinian women in the courtyard of Al-Aqsa Mosque in Jerusalem by Israel Police.

The caption read: “I am not a brainless stupid tiktoker muslim girl. I am an arabian muslim girl. I will fight for my Masjid-ul-Aqsa until the last breath of my life.

 Stop me if you can!”

ALSO READ: Fact Check: Old, edited video of PM Modi shared with misleading…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found the claim attached with the picture to be FAKE.

On putting the above picture through Reverse Image Search, we came across an article dated December 4, 2019, in The Sun which featured the same picture.

According to the caption of the picture, the above picture is from Chile, taken in 2016 during a pro-democracy protest in Santiago.

In conclusion, the above information proves that the picture in question is old and it has no connection with the turn of events in Israel.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
